node.name: Elastic Head Lamp MAKE: SEASPIRIT
node.description: Most accepted product that has application in many works, waterproof, multifocal lamp with power back for 8 hours in single charge. Non-brittle plastic with rubber envelop that is adjustable to maximum head size. Main centre SMD bulb has life of 3 years and changeable at any local store. (SIZE: 300mm perimeter / WEIGHT: 250 grams)
node.content: Commercial innovative product that has application in many sectors but usually accepted and favoured by trekkers for night time movement and cooking work when each free hand is an advantage / Adjustable head mount includes rubber straps, alloy plastic which has maximum perimeter that can fit full grown head / 3 watt bulb produce 160 lumen which is enough to see 5 meter distance and on single charge it can continuously work for 8 hours / Optical fibre convex lens over LED bulb and whole headlamp arrangement can be rotated 90 degree vertical as per requirement / Inner seven hole type cooling system and also rotating zoom device for varying jobs like dentist and miners / Rechargeable battery is need to get install or also one can use "AA" battery for emergency purpose.
node.alt: SEASPIRIT LED Head Lamp Flash Light Torch with Adjustable Rechargeable Battery for Camping Trekking Caving Hiking Reading Running

node.name: Flash Head Lamp MAKE: SEAHAVEN
node.description: Super adjustable system band provide maximum comfort and with 3 mark focused head lamp one can see the distance up to 10 meter. Special feature like SOS(Save our Souls) mode of signal in lamp which get triggered automatically when head hit with more than endurance limit. (SIZE: 320mm perimeter / WEIGHT: 290 grams)
node.content: With multiple lighting mode and adjustable brightness level, also water resistant casing makes it perfect for any weather safety cum essential trekking item / 1 superior head lamp and 2 secondary supporting lamp it consume less battery as compare to other competing products / "AA" rechargeable battery provide brightness of 3 watt LED bulb for more than 3 hours / Superior head lamp is 90 degree adjustable but rest secondary lamps are fixed / Safety feature like automatic signalling at time of some mis happening or accident is also installed / Head band is lightweight and can adjusted to any Indian head size, also break free and tuck into backpack, glove compartment or side pocket.
node.alt: SEAHAVEN LED Head Lamp Flash Light Torch with Adjustable Rechargeable Battery for Camping Trekking Caving Hiking Reading Running
